Content: <skill id='Target_CripplingBlow' icon='Skill_Warrior_CripplingBlow'/>Crippling Blow deals additional <font color='#CD1F1F'>piercing damage</font> to disabled targets.

<skill id='MultiStrike_BlinkStrike' icon='Skill_Warrior_BlinkStrike'/>Blitz Attack applies Vulnerable to targets hit. Vulnerable lasts until the end of your turn, and deals a one-time amount of bonus damage on hit.
<skill id='Projectile_ThrowingKnife' icon='Skill_Rogue_ThrowingKnife'/>Throwing Knife is enhanced with a chance to do bonus damage.
<skill id='Rush_BatteringRam' icon='Skill_Warrior_BatteringRam'/>Battering Ram has a 25% chance to apply Dizzy for 1 turn.
<skill id='Target_CripplingBlow' icon='Skill_Warrior_CripplingBlow'/>Crippling Blow applies Sundered, reducing max Physical and Magic Armor by 25%.
<skill id='Cone_GroundSmash' icon='Skill_Warrior_GroundSmash'/>Battle Stomp creates a localized quake at the point of initial impact, dealing bonus damage in a 3m radius.
